title: Between Us
overview: Ilyas and Yasemin are a couple in love - until Yasemin is shot by an unknown assailant in their shared caf√©. Ilyas' life, as well as that of their daughter Senna, completely falls apart. And as the police begin to link him and his deceased wife to the crime, Ilyas finds himself utterly bewildered. The longer the suspicions persist, the more he wonders: Was Yasemin truly the woman he loved?
